title: can't figure out how to add a paper size
content:
Hello,

I'm using Firefox on my mac and have spent the last 2 hours just trying to figure out how to add a custom paper size. I need to print 2.25" x 1.25" labels on a Dymo printer. But there is nowhere to add a paper size and only 5 paper size options.

How do I simply add a paper size?
creator: janine.hamilton

title: Saved Passwords/logins keep dropping out
content: Team, I love FF, I really do and i want to make FF my default browser and move away from Chrome, but I keep loosing my saved login credentials and have to constantly refresh FF by threatening to remove it from Control Panel, it then asks me to try a refresh and yippee problem solved. However, I can't keep doing this daily, it's killing me. is there something i'm missing here? P
creator: paul.greenfield
